text:
Certified
public accountants generally meet the duties requirements for the learned
professional exemption.  In addition, many other accountants who are not
certified public accountants but perform similar job duties may qualify as
exempt learned professionals.  However, accounting clerks, bookkeepers and
other employees who normally perform a great deal of routine work generally
will not qualify as exempt professionals.   29
CFR § 541.301(e)(5)
html:
Certified public accountants generally meet the duties requirements for the learned professional exemption.  In addition, many other accountants who are not certified public accountants but perform similar job duties may qualify as exempt learned professionals.  However, accounting clerks, bookkeepers and other employees who normally perform a great deal of routine work generally will not qualify as exempt professionals. 

 

29 CFR § 541.301(e)(5)
